name: All Around the Coffee Shop
description:
Take on the role of Caesar in this peculiar little game and try to survive your day-to-day work at Rocket's cafe "Apes strong. Coffee stronger!"

Different branches, different themes, everything from humor to romance to creepiness. There should be something for almost everyone :3

Things to keep in mind:

* This is my 1st VN done in Ren'Py. If you encounter any bugs let me know. Please be aware that I might not be able to fix them. I'm no programmer and I'm still surprised that this piece of work ... works ^^; I'll do my best to help!
* Some branches are very short and I'm not super happy with them, so I might go back and polish them a bit more.
* Sorry to make your eyes bleed with the art ^^

Updates:

Update 2020/07/02: Version 4.0 - The GUI is now slightly prettier. Fixed a few minor text issues.
Update 2020/04/17: Version 3.0 - We now have sound! Fixed a few minor text issues.
Update: Version 2.0 - Fixed part of the code where a CG wasn't showing correctly
